summary: In 1985, a celebrated exorcist trapped a horrific demon inside a ouija board. Thinking the board to be a game, his son played without obeying the rules, and let the demon loose. In order to... See full summary Â»
cast: J. Damian Anastasio|Brittney Bertier|Cameron Bigelow|Jay Brothers|Tony Harutyunyan|Lola Kelly|Laura Kirchner|Walker Mintz|Ben Morrison|Lynne Newton|Michael Palladino|Julia Rae|Branden Smith
title: The Ouija Exorcism
